explains: adj. 不民主的，非民主的

sentences.en: He was accused of being capricious and undemocratic.
sentences.cn: 他被指责反复无常，不讲民主。

sentences.en: Opponents denounced the law as undemocratic and unconstitutional.
sentences.cn: 反对者们抨击这项法律是不民主的、是违反宪法的。

sentences.en: His undemocratic London Docklands Development Corporation overrode planning controls, amassed land acquisition powers and avoided grand strategic plans.
sentences.cn: 他那独断的伦敦码头区开发公司对这个区域的计划有优先控制权，囤积收购土地，避免了大战略计划。
